name: Squeaky Elk on The Moon!
description: First game ever for the Butterscotch Shenanijam! I made this with the help of the wonderful musician Carminbit! She is a wonder to work with. Originally I had an artist by the name of Slainlight, and all was going well, until I discovered he was stealing assets from other people. Thus, I had to scramble to finish art myself, and I am no artist! Oh well! I tried! =)
